subject: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
FACT FINDING OFFICE
INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT CENTRE,
152-160 CITY RD, LONDON EC1V 2NX,
UNITED KINGDOM
Attn:
Sequel to the mandate of the United Nations to clear and release all
processed funds/payments not associated with drugs and terrorist
activities to deserving beneficiaries without further delay. It may
interest you to know that based on the current financial policy on all
foreign
payments.
The International payment settlement unit has approved your
outstanding payment worth US15.5Million with the accrued interest to
released to you via any of her cash payment centers spread across the
globe.
The implication of this approval is that every short listed
beneficiary like you must travel to the assigned center/office in
person to sign all the relevant fund release order documents/bond
before proceeding to the cash payment center for immediate payment
release without requesting for any upfront fees/charges.
We are aware of the cost implication/expenses involved in this process
knowing fully well that you might be unable to take care of the high
traveling expenses associated in this process. In respect of the above
subject, we have contracted the services of a
seasoned investor/ sponsor who will cover every expenses jn this
process, including your return flight tickets, hotel reservations,
feeding and taxi respectively hence you will not be expected to put
forward any money from your pocket on this subject.
Please note that the investor is demanding for 15% only of your total
payment as his entitlement for the sponsorship of this project.
 I hope
this
arrangement is OK by you? it is important you revert back to us
urgently to enable us proceed with the needful accordingly.
We await your earliest response!
Yours Faithfully
Hon. Edward Hicks
Payment Coordinator,
International Payment Center.

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Hello Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my payment. I appreciate the information you have provided. Can you please provide more details about the process and how it works? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

Also, could you clarify who the seasoned investor sponsor is and how they will cover all the expenses associated with this process? It's important for me to have a clear understanding of their involvement.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Attention: Andrea,

Your mail has been received and the contents noted down. First, It is very
important for you to know that this very process is different from your
previous dealings with the fraudster, this is 100% genuine and not a
child's play.  It is a  once in a life time opportunity for you to receive
your long overdue funds/payment in person without any upfront payment or
hitch.

The sponsor of this project is a seasoned investor who will Carter and
cover every expenses/charges needed to complete this project, before the
final release of your funds payment. The investor is only demanding 15% of
your total long overdue funds payment worth US$15.5M, as his entitlement
for the sponsorship of this project.

It is purely legal and everything will be handled through bank to bank
transaction, after you have concluded signing the Final Funds Release Order
Documents in one of the payment outlet.

You're not expected to pay any upfront fees like your previous dealings
with the scammers.  Be also informed that a good hospitality, security are
guaranteed with proper medical arrangements in place, during your trip to
the payment outlet until you received your funds payment and return back.

But you need to take your Covid Vaccination full dose and have proof of it
before you'll be allowed to embark on the trip. Also, you are advised to
come with your proper medications if you're on medical treatment.   Your
feeding, hotel accommodation and other logistics would be paid for in your
favor once you indicate your readiness.

So, there is nothing else to worry about. Your travel is estimated to be
less than a 5 days trip. Taxi money will be provided too upon your arrival
and further money for expenses will be given to you too upon your arrival.
In order for us to commence and proceed with the processing of your claim,
you are expected to reconfirm your details as requested below:

Your Full Name:
Contact Address:
Phone Number:
Nationality:
Scanned copies of your International Passport:

We await you to revert back to indicate your readiness.

Yours Faithfully
Hon. Edward Hicks
International Payment Center.

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Dear Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with this information. I appreciate your assurance that this process is different from previous dealings with fraudsters. It's good to know that there won't be any upfront payment or issues.

I understand that the sponsor of this project will cover all the expenses needed to complete the project, which is reassuring. However, I have a few questions before I can indicate my readiness:

1. Could you please provide more details about the seasoned investor who is sponsoring this project? What is their background and experience?

2. How exactly will the funds be released to me? Can you explain the bank-to-bank process in more detail?

3. You mentioned signing Final Funds Release Order Documents at a payment outlet. Could you clarify where this payment outlet is located?

4. Regarding the Covid vaccination requirement, what kind of proof do I need to provide? Will a vaccination certificate suffice?

5. If I decide to proceed with this opportunity, how soon can we start the processing of my claim?

Thank you once again for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I look forward to receiving your response and getting further clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Dear Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with this information. I appreciate your assurance that this process is different from previous dealings with fraudsters. It's good to know that there won't be any upfront payment or issues involved.

I understand that the sponsor of this project will cover all the expenses needed to complete the project, and they are requesting a portion of my long overdue funds payment as their fee. Could you please provide more details about the investor and their background? I want to make sure everything is legitimate before proceeding.

You mentioned that everything will be handled through bank to bank after signing the Final Funds Release Order Documents at one of the payment outlets. Can you clarify which payment outlet I would need to visit? Also, what documents would I need to bring with me for this process?

Regarding the Covid vaccination requirement, I have already received both doses of the vaccine and can provide proof if necessary. However, I would like to know more about the medical arrangements in place during my trip and how my safety will be ensured.

Lastly, could you please provide an estimated timeline for this entire process? It would be helpful for me to plan accordingly.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Attention: Andrea,

Am in receipt of your mail and all the contents well noted down. Like we
stated earlier, any shortlisted beneficiary must be present at the
designated payment outlets currently active in a country of Zambia, in
southern African or Laos, in Asia, to sign all the relevant Payment Release
Order Documents in person for a very important reason.

Once you complied by forwarding the requested details to commence process,
I will not hesitate to squint you with the details of the
investor/coordinator of this project so you can establish a direct contact
with him to know more. Regarding the COVID-19 vaccine, all you're expected
to present is proof of vaccination.

Then, after signing all the relevant Payment Release Order Documents at the
payment outlet as stated above, you'll be going to the country designated
for the releasing of your funds payment, to present the signed Payment
Release Documents to the payment release officials, with gift souvenirs to
appease the payment release officials in that country, to speedy up the
release of your funds payment to you without any hitch or delay.

You shouldn't be worried about anything concerning the conclusion of this
project,  because the Coordinator of this program will be the one to take
care of all your trip expenses to and fro, even back to your country, such
as your hotel accommodations, feeding, taxi and other logistics involved.

That is the reason why the investor contracted to sponsor this project is
entitled to take a certain percentage from your total funds payment after
you received your funds payment, for the  sponsorship of this project. Be
also assured that your security and good hospitality are also in place and
guaranteed.

I promise that you'll have a trip you'll ever live to remember throughout
your entire lifetime. Finally, you are advised to indicate your readiness
to visit any of the payment outlet to sign the payment release documents to
enable us commence action, as time is of essence in this project.
Therefore, you are expected to furnish us with your details as earlier
requested.

I await your earliest response !

Yours Sincerely,
Hon. Edward Hicks.

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Dear Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with more information about the project. I appreciate your willingness to share the details of the investor once I provide the requested information.

I understand that I need to visit one of the designated payment outlets in either Zambia or Laos to sign the relevant Payment Release Order Documents in person. Could you please clarify why it is necessary for me to be physically present at the payment outlet? Is there a specific reason for this requirement?

Additionally, you mentioned that I would need to present proof of something regarding the vaccine. Could you please explain what kind of proof is required and why it is necessary?

I also want to express my gratitude for assuring me that all expenses related to my trip will be taken care of by the investor. It's good to know that my security and well-being are also being considered.

Before proceeding further, could you please provide me with more details about the project itself? What exactly does it entail and what are its objectives? Understanding these aspects will help me make an informed decision.

Thank you once again, and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Andrea

body:

subject: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Dear Andrea,

This is to acknowledge receipt of your mail and the contents are well
noted. First, I want to correct an impression that this project is not a
child's play.

Please, be advised that one of the reasons why you're expected to be at the
payment outlet physically in person is for you to witness all this process
by yourself and to avoid any sort of manipulation.

Regarding the COVID-19 vaccination proof, I have finally discovered it is
no longer important or needed for the trip because COVID is no longer on
rampage.

Finally, you should understand that the main objective of this project is
to guide you step by step to receive your long overdue payment without any
hitch, delay or upfront charges from you.

Once I hear from you and received your details as earlier requested, I will
not hesitate to furnish you with the details of the coordinator/investor to
enable you establish a contact with him.

I await your earliest response.

Yours Sincerely,
Hon. Edward Hicks.

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE
body:
Dear Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your clarification regarding the seriousness of this project. It's good to know that being physically present at the payment outlet is necessary to witness the process firsthand.

I understand that you mentioned the proof is no longer needed due to COVID no longer being a concern. However, I would still like to have some form of verification or documentation before proceeding further. Can you provide any other form of proof or information that can assure me of the legitimacy of this opportunity?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the investor and their involvement in this project. Could you please share some details about them? How did they become interested in assisting with my long overdue payment?

Thank you once again for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: FACT FINDING OFFICE------MORE DETAILED INFORMATION
body:
Dear Sir,

This is to acknowledge receipt of your email. Am very sorry for my late
response, which was due to heavy official workload on my shoulder.

You should also understand that delay is the deadliest form of denial. I do
not see reason why you keep delaying in furnishing your details to enable
us commence the processing of this project.

Like I stated earlier, one of the main reasons why you're requested to fly
to the payment outlet is signed all the relevant Payment Release Order
Documents in person and witness all the procedures in person firsthand.

Therefore, due to the sensitive nature of these documents, it will not be
possible to send them to you via email attachment on the internet, for
perusal before you come in person to sign them.

 Finally, the main reason for the involvement of the investor is form to
sponsor this project until your funds payment is finally released to you.
So that you'll not be asked for any payment of any fee from your own pocket.

I await your earliest response.

Yours Sincerely,
Hon. Edward Hicks.

subject: Re: FACT FINDING OFFICE------MORE DETAILED INFORMATION
body:
Hello Hon. Edward Hicks,

Thank you for your email and for providing me with this information. I understand the importance of timely responses and appreciate your patience.

I would like to know more about the project you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some details regarding the nature of the project and how I can be involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Andrea

subject: FACT FINDING OFFICE------MORE DETAILED INFORMATION
body:
Dear Sir,

Your mail has been received and contents noted. You are expected to relax
your mind and go with all directives and instructions, in order to make
this project a success and a reality. Be assured that anything concerning
your Visa to and fro and other travel expenses would be paid by Dr. Holman,
the coordinator of this project.

Meanwhile, you should also start preparing yourself concerning your trip,
since your trip  will be scheduled shortly by the Coordinator. You already
know that you're going to the payment outlet to sign all the relevant
Payment Release Order Documents, for the releasing of your delayed funds
payment.

Finally, it is imperative for me to let you know that in order for you to
make this project a grand success, you must adhere and always rely on Dr.
HOLMAN'S, directives to avoid any mistake that is capable of causing hitch
or delay.

I await your details as requested to enable us commence.

Yours Sincerely,
Hon. Edward Hicks.

 Before I will guide you further on step by step on how to complete this
